definitions.definition: Downward movement , fall . (Can we add an example for this sense?)
A sloping downward , e.g. of a hill or road. (Can we add an example for this sense?)
A deterioration of condition ; a weakening or worsening .
examples: He has experienced a sudden decline in his health.
Educational standards are on the decline .
The country's global reputation is in decline .

definitions.definition: A reduction or diminution of activity , prevalence or quantity .
examples: Population decline is a major concern.
Town-centre retailers have seen a decline in footfall.

definitions.definition: The act of declining or refusing something.

main_definition: Downward movement , fall . (Can we add an example for this sense?)
